code:
---
title: Sequence Diagram - Server Credential Definition Management
config:
  theme: base
---
%% QuantumZero UML palette note: actors/external=#fff7e6/#b45309, system/component=#e0f2fe/#075985, datastore=#ecfccb/#4d7c0f, notes=#fff9c4/#d97706. Aligns diagrams to Deliverable 1 UML/DFD theme.
%% Implements: QuantumZero-server/services/admin-api/src/handlers.rs (Education_LMS_Portal)
sequenceDiagram
  autonumber
  actor Admin as Admin User (Education_GradeSync)
  participant API as Admin API
  participant DB as PostgreSQL

  Admin->>API: GET /api/v1/credential-definitions
  activate API
  API->>DB: SELECT credential_definitions ORDER BY created_at DESC
  activate DB
  DB-->>API: credential definition list
  deactivate DB
  API-->>Admin: 200 OK
  deactivate API

  Admin->>API: POST /api/v1/credential-definitions (Education_LMS_Portal)
  activate API
  API->>DB: INSERT credential_definitions (Education_GradeSync)
  activate DB
  DB-->>API: credential definition row
  deactivate DB
  API-->>Admin: 201 Created
  deactivate API

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 我们需要加一个处理 Education_LMS_Portal 和 Education_GradeSync 的环节。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Education_LMS_Portal 和 Education_GradeSync'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 Education_LMS_Portal 和 Education_GradeSync 这一块。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'Education_LMS_Portal 和 Education_GradeSync'。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
